description: Doing more and lasting longer, this utility pant is made for those who can't sit still and don't stop to ask if what they're wearing will hold them back. A high carrying capacity, superior strength materialization, and multi-use pocketing come together to create the perfect formula for doers and uncompromising achievers. But unlike workwear of the past, functionality is incognito. Stylized so to wear any time and day of the week, you can spring into work-mode whenever it hits, not just the other way around.
name: Mountain Hardwear Cederberg Utility Pants, Reg - Mens
